parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

datasetStructure: One record per finding per specimen per subject

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MI.STUDYID

datasetVariables.description: Unique identifier for a study.
datasetVariables.label: Study Identifier
datasetVariables.name: STUDYID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MI.DOMAIN

datasetVariables.description: Two-character abbreviation for the domain.
datasetVariables.label: Domain Abbreviation
datasetVariables.name: DOMAIN

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MI.USUBJID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.
datasetVariables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
datasetVariables.name: USUBJID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MI.MISEQ

datasetVariables.description: Sequence number given to ensure uniqueness of subject records within a domain. May be any valid number.
datasetVariables.label: Sequence Number
datasetVariables.name: MISEQ

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MI.MIGRPID

datasetVariables.description: Used to tie together a block of related records in a single domain for a subject. This is not the treatment group number.
datasetVariables.label: Group Identifier
datasetVariables.name: MIGRPID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MI.MIREFID

datasetVariables.description: Internal or external specimen identifier. Example: Specimen barcode number.
datasetVariables.label: Specimen Reference Identifier
datasetVariables.name: MIREFID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MI.MISPID

datasetVariables.description: Mass identifier such as MASS 1 or MASS A. Used when the mass was discovered during the in-life phase or during pathology and assigned a mass identifier. The mass identification should be unique within the subject, regardless of mass location.
datasetVariables.label: Mass Identifier
datasetVariables.name: MISPID

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C89974

modelClassVariable.title: Short Name of Measurement, Test or Examination

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MI.MITESTCD

datasetVariables.description: Short name of the measurement, test, or examination described in MITEST. It can be used as a column name when converting a dataset from a vertical to a horizontal format. The value in MITESTCD cannot be longer than 8 characters, nor can it start with a number (e.g., "1TEST" is not valid). MITESTCD cannot contain characters other than letters, numbers, or underscores. Extensible controlled value is MIEXAM.
datasetVariables.label: Microscopic Examination Short Name
datasetVariables.name: MITESTCD

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C89973

modelClassVariable.title: Name of Measurement, Test or Examination

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MI.MITEST

datasetVariables.description: Long name for MITESTCD. The value in MITEST cannot be longer than 40 characters. Extensible controlled value is Microscopic Examination.
datasetVariables.label: Microscopic Examination Name
datasetVariables.name: MITEST

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C88026

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MI.MIBODSYS

datasetVariables.description: Body system or organ class associated with the measurement performed.
datasetVariables.label: Body System or Organ Class
datasetVariables.name: MIBODSYS

modelClassVariable.title: Result or Finding in Original Units

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MI.MIORRES

datasetVariables.description: Text description of the findings as originally received or collected, including the base pathological process and any modifiers.
datasetVariables.label: Result or Findings as Collected
datasetVariables.name: MIORRES

modelClassVariable.title: Result or Finding in Standard Format

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MI.MISTRESC

datasetVariables.description: Contains only the base pathological process (e.g., NECROSIS) from MIORRES without any modifiers such as severity, distribution, frequency, grade, etc. Or, if the examination was completed and there were no findings, the value must be NORMAL. Tumors must be populated using TFSTRESC controlled list. MISTRESC is not currently controlled for non-neoplastic/non-tumor findings.
datasetVariables.label: Standardized Result in Character Format
datasetVariables.name: MISTRESC

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C90017

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MI.MIRESCAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to categorize the result of a finding. Example: MALIGNANT for tumor findings. Histopathological findings may be categorized as NON-NEOPLASTIC.
datasetVariables.label: Result Category
datasetVariables.name: MIRESCAT

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66789

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MI.MISTAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to indicate examination not done or result is missing. Should be null if a result exists in MIORRES.
datasetVariables.label: Completion Status
datasetVariables.name: MISTAT

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MI.MIREASND

datasetVariables.description: Describes why MISTAT is NOT DONE, such as SAMPLE AUTOLYZED or SPECIMEN LOST.
datasetVariables.label: Reason Not Done
datasetVariables.name: MIREASND

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MI.MINAM

datasetVariables.description: Name or identifier of the laboratory or vendor who provides the test results if different per animal or different from Trial Summary (TS).
datasetVariables.label: Laboratory Name
datasetVariables.name: MINAM

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C77529

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MI.MISPEC

datasetVariables.description: Subject of the observation. Defines the type of specimen used for a measurement. Examples: LIVER, HEART, BONE MARROW.
datasetVariables.label: Specimen Material Type
datasetVariables.name: MISPEC

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MI.MIANTREG

datasetVariables.description: Example: Cortex, Medulla, or Femur (if the MISPEC is, for example, BONE MARROW).
datasetVariables.label: Anatomical Region of Specimen
datasetVariables.name: MIANTREG

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MI.MISPCCND

datasetVariables.description: Free or standardized text describing the condition of the specimen. Example: AUTOLYZED.
datasetVariables.label: Specimen Condition
datasetVariables.name: MISPCCND

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66742

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MI.MISPCUFL

datasetVariables.description: Describes the usability of the specimen for the test. Example: N = the specimen is not usable; otherwise null.
datasetVariables.label: Specimen Usability for the Test
datasetVariables.name: MISPCUFL

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MI.MIMETHOD

datasetVariables.description: Method of the test or examination. This could be different types of coloring used for the slides whenever appropriate. Examples: H&E.
datasetVariables.label: Method of Test or Examination
datasetVariables.name: MIMETHOD

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C99073

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MI.MILAT

datasetVariables.description: Qualifier for laterality of the specimen within the subject for paired specimens. Examples: LEFT, RIGHT, BILATERAL.
datasetVariables.label: Specimen Laterality within Subject
datasetVariables.name: MILAT

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C99074

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MI.MIDIR

datasetVariables.description: Qualifier for directionality of the specimen within the subject. Examples: DORSAL, PROXIMAL.
datasetVariables.label: Specimen Directionality within Subject
datasetVariables.name: MIDIR

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MI.MIEVAL

datasetVariables.description: Role of the person who provided the evaluation. Example: TOX PATHOLOGIST, PEER REVIEW, SPONSOR PATHOLOGIST.
datasetVariables.label: Evaluator
datasetVariables.name: MIEVAL

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C90000

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MI.MISEV

datasetVariables.description: Describes the severity of a particular finding.
datasetVariables.label: Severity
datasetVariables.name: MISEV

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66742

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MI.MIDTHREL

datasetVariables.description: Describes the relationship of a particular finding to the death of a subject (Y=caused death, N=did not cause death, U=unknown). May be left null if not available.
datasetVariables.label: Relationship to Death
datasetVariables.name: MIDTHREL

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MI.MIDTC

datasetVariables.description: Date/time of specimen collection, in ISO 8601 format.
datasetVariables.label: Date/Time of Specimen Collection
datasetVariables.name: MIDTC

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MI.MIDY

datasetVariables.description: Study day of specimen collection, in integer days. The algorithm for calculations must be relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC variable in the Demographics (DM) domain.
datasetVariables.label: Study Day of Specimen Collection
datasetVariables.name: MIDY

description: A findings domain that contains histopathology findings and microscopic evaluations. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, SDOMAIN, C95095, 2018-06-29)
label: Microscopic Findings
name: MI
